text:
[Verse]
Woke up in the morning light
Dreams still dancing in my sight
Stepped outside to feel the rain
Washing away all the pain

[Verse 2]
Puddles forming on the street
Water splashing 'neath my feet
Laughing as I twirl around
Lost in the magic I found

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain alone
Feel the rhythm in my bones
Every drop a sweet refrain
Join me dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Clouds above are silver-gray
But my heart's not feeling fray
Every step a melody
Raindrops are my company

[Bridge]
Hands up high I touch the sky
Rain and me we don't ask why
Twisting turning feeling free
Like the rain's a part of me

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain alone
Feel the rhythm in my bones
Every drop a sweet refrain
Join me dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
